mn128:7.4: udakañca pādānaṃ dhovanaṃ → udakañca pādānaṃ (bj, s1, s2, km, pts1)
mn128:8.1: kimilo → kimbilo (bj, s2, s3, km, pts1) | kimmilo (s1)
mn128:22.5: patameyya → matameyya (si, s2, s3, km, pts1) | tamameyya (s1)
mn128:28.3: divaṃ → divasaṃ (bj, s1-3, km, pts1), rattindivaṃ → rattindivanti (bj) | rattidivaṃ (mr)
